name: The North Face Activist Mid FUTURELIGHT Light Trail Shoes - Men's
categories: Activist Mid FUTURELIGHT Light Trail Shoes
description: Looking for a hiking shoe that doesn't look like a hiking shoe? The Activist pairs trail technology with the look and feel of a sneaker. The lightweight upper is paired with the super-breathable FutureLight waterproof membrane for protection on muddy or dewy trails, and the moulded collar provides ankle stability in uneven terrain. The EXTS rubber and lugs ensure you stay upright in slippery and loose terrain.Mesh upper with TPU-overlays for durability without the weight.FutureLight™ waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry and comfortable.Gusseted tongue keeps debris out.Protective toecap adds durability and toe protection, and a TPU heel overlay stabilizes the foot.Removable OrthoLite® Hybrid footbed for underfoot comfort.EVA midsole for lightweight cushion.Sticky EXTS™ outsole provides sure-footing on the trail.
